name: High Sierra Climbing 2nd Edition
description: Attentions alpine lovers, this High Sierra guide is your ticket to discovering more than 40 of the best routes in a stunning alpine setting. The guide includes classic rock routes, adventurous ridge traverses, and popular snow and alpine ice routes. Climbs range from 3rd class to 5.11. Includes extensive information for navigating  canyons, drainages, glaciers, lakes, and meadows, and of course, soaring granite peaks.
